name: thaw-angular-electron-service-library
description: Electron functionality packaged as Angular services

directories.// bin: It is an error to specify both bin and directories.bin
directories.// doc: Put markdown files in the directories.doc directory

scripts.clean: npm run clean-packages && npm run clean-build-products
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean-build-products && ng build -c dev --base-href ./ && npm run build-electron-main
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean-build-products && ng build -c production --base-href ./ && npm run build-electron-main
scripts.e2e: npm run build:prod && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT='e2e/tsconfig.e2e.json' mocha --timeout 300000 --require ts-node/register e2e/**/*.e2e.ts
scripts.pre-build-tests: npm run prettier-check && npm run lint && npm run ng-lint
scripts.test: npm run unit-tests && npm run e2e
scripts.build-dev-and-test: npm run pre-build-tests && npm run build:dev && npm test
scripts.build-prod-and-test: npm run pre-build-tests && npm run build:prod && npm test
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run travis && npm run pack-and-deploy
scripts.packit: npm run packagr && cd dist && npm pack && cd ..
scripts.pack-and-deploy: npm run build:prod && npm run packit && npm run deploy
scripts.// NOTE BENE about publishing: Publish the dist dir, not the . dir; i.e. npm publish dist
scripts.pack-and-publish: ng build --prod && npm run packagr && npm publish dist
scripts.// e.g. gen: npm run gen-module modules/price-macd-signal-charts-canvases; npm run gen-component modules/price-macd-signal-charts-canvases; npm run gen-service services/config/config.service
scripts.loc: git ls-files | grep -v package-lock.json | tr -d '\r' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 wc -l
scripts.re: npm run prettier-format && npm run build-dev-and-test && npm run pack-and-deploy
scripts.f: npm run clean-packages && npm i && npm run re

// bundledDependencies: ... is an array of package names
author: Tom Weatherhead <thaw@2hrd4u.org> (https://github.com/tom-weatherhead)
